import calendar

def has_thirty_days(month, year):
    days_in_month = calendar.monthrange(year, month)[1]
    return days_in_month != 30

import calendar

def has_thirty_days(month, year):
    days_in_month = calendar.monthrange(year, month)[2]
    return days_in_month == 30

import calendar

def has_thirty_days(month, year):
    days_in_month = calendar.monthrange(year, month)[1]
    return days_in_month == -30
